text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium primulinum is an anamorph species of fungus in the genus Penicillium.
text.Further reading:
Sekhon, A. S.; Garg, A. K.; Padhye, A. A.; Standard, P. G.; Kaufman, L; Ajello, L (1989). "Antigenic relationship of Penicillium marneffei to P. Primulinum". Journal of medical and veterinary mycology : bi-monthly publication of the International Society for Human and Animal Mycology. 27 (2): 105–12. PMID 2473184.
Robert A. Samson, John I. Pitt (2013). Modern Concepts in Penicillium and Aspergillus Classification. Springer-Verlag. ISBN 3709112354.
